Message:
From that day on,
I wandered the world as
a travelin’ gunslinger myself.

It didn’t change the fact that
I was spendin’ my days runnin’
from the Inquisition.
But unlike before,
every day’s now full of fun!

I have the great Cordie
to thank for that, too.

If she hadn’t
called out to me back then,

I’d be crouched down in the
dark of those alleys even now.

The great Cordie shone
a bright light on my future.

A half-rate gunslinger like me
still can’t stand on the same stage
as the great Cordie...

But, I’ll practice lots and lots
till I get good enough
to perform ’longside her!

I mean, I’m able to pull off
stunts now I couldn’t even
dream of doin’ at first.
So, let’s keep this
gunsmoke blazin’!
